name: MBlue Simple-Gray Statusbar Icon
description:
Description:
 A dynamic Stutusbar ICON that changes when hovering different kind of links.
--------------------------------------------------------------------
What it does:
 - integrate with the Simple-Gray Theme

 - Show an icon that changes when hovering different kinds of links:
  > http, ftp, irc, javascript, images, videos, audio, programs (exe, msi), zip files, documents, mail links, etc...

 - Show an addictional arrow icon when hovering torrents/ed2k links
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Notes:
 - You can customize the Extensions to fit your needs.
 - You may need to change some label if using a different language
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Integrates with:
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme
 MBlue Simple-Gray Theme Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar
 MBlue Simple-Gray Sidebar Ext-Support
 MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Download
 MBlue Simple-Gray Slim-Extension
 MBlue Simple-Gray Top-Toolbar
 MBlue Simple-Gray Popup
 MBlue Combine Nav-Buttons Vista
--------------------------------------------------------------------
Updates:
 27.07.2008 Ver. 0.2.5 = new version
 18.07.2008 Ver. 0.2.1 = updated
 17.07.2008 Ver. 0.2.0 = released
--------------------------------------------------------------------
If someone needs more file-type support etc. just ask.
Enjoy!
